item.title: "Search feature" not working!
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:12, topic:60226”][quote author=parad0x_ link=topic=86723.msg922796#msg922796 date=1172025632]

That won’t change anything… 1.1.2 just patches some bugs and exploits… And it takes forever for Mopar to upgrade because of the two fused forums. That or hes lazy.

if it patches bug and exploits why dont we take advantage of the fact the mopar hasn’t upgraded yet…
[/quote]
I’m not sure if that is supposed to be funny, stupid, or rude.

But with the moparscape servers, if you have too many actions in too short of a time, it will kick you out. Since I do not have the source or complete knowlege of mopar’s forum. I be there could be a mod made that will register in a short scale on the actions take between. So, say the database takes a 10 second log of every action(not the post text, but posting included) and will look for actions from the same IP in TOO short of a time. And will mark that IP. Then it will Temperalily(spelled wrong) Bann the IP for say, 10 minutes. Then if the marks >= 6 then IP has permanant ban. And everytime just visiting the forum, say put this in the index.php, it will check the IP against all outstanding banned IP’s in the MySQL database. After being checked, It will could write a cookie(expires every 11 minutes, and then checked on next action) for the database’s stress release, and the it worx! Yes, a very long sentance, a long sentence indeed.[/quote]
I still think this way is a lot more cooler. And smarter too cuz it will stop idiots from doing that, anyway, i like the forum without having crappy errors all the time tho… I STILL WANT SEARCHING ENABLED!

Read full topic

item.title: "Search feature" not working!
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

or you could put this code in

<!-- SiteSearch Google -->
<FORM method=GET action="http://www.google.com/search">
<input type=hidden name=ie value=UTF-8>
<input type=hidden name=oe value=UTF-8>
<TABLE bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><tr><td>
<A HREF="http://www.google.com/">
<IMG SRC="http://www.google.com/logos/Logo_40wht.gif" 
border="0" ALT="Google"></A>
</td>
<td>
<INPUT TYPE=text name=q size=31 maxlength=255 value="">
<INPUT type=submit name=btnG VALUE="Google Search">
<font size=-1>
<input type=hidden name=domains value="moparisthebest.com/smf/"><br><input type=radio name=sitesearch value=""> WWW <input type=radio name=sitesearch value="moparisthebest.com/smf/" checked> moparisthebest.com/smf/<br>
</font>
</td></tr></TABLE>
</FORM>
<!-- SiteSearch Google -->

Read full topic
